menu.link: Link the movement of the moon to the time

tooltip.duration: That is <<1 [less than a day/a day/$d days]>> in Tamriel.
tooltip.isWaxing:
The moon is <<1>>% full and is waxing.
He needs <<2 [less than one hour/one hour/$d hours]>>,
to reach its full glory.
tooltip.full:
The moon is full right now.
It will stay that way for <<1 [less than one hour/one hour/$d hours]>>.
tooltip.isWaning:
The moon is <<1>>% full and is waning.
He needs <<2>> hours again,
to reach its full glory.

error.library: Could not connect to the LibClockTST library.

styles.tSize: Clockのサイズを変更します。
styles.tFont: Clockのフォントを変更します。
styles.tFormat: You can write a symbol (# for lore, % for real) followed by a letter:
styles.nFormat: Write your own format of the time and date
styles.tScaleFactor: How much the item should increase when hovering.
styles.tBackgroundOffset: Offset to the calculated width of the background.
styles.dFormat:
%A		 full weekday name [Friday]
%a		 for the abbreviated [Fri]
%B		 full month name [March]
%b		 for the abbreviated [Mar]
%d		 day of the month
%H		 hour
%M		 minute
%m		 month
%p		 either "am" or "pm"
%S		 second
%w		 weekday [1-7 = Monday-Sunday]
%x		 date [17.02.20]
%X		 time [23:48:10 | 11:48 PM]
%Y		 full year [2020]
%y		 shortened year [20]
styles.tStyle: Clockのスタイルを変更します。

booleans.tFake: Will replace the day, month and week day in Tamriel with the real one but with Tamriel names.
booleans.tAddZero: 桁の数字にゼロを追加します: 1:24 -> 01:24.
booleans.nLink: Link the movements of the label with the moon
booleans.nJapanese: 真夜中を0時として表示
booleans.wAffect: This does only affect a custom format not #X or %X.
booleans.tMovable: Clockが移動可能になります。

feedback.tFeedback:
If you found a bug, have a request or a suggestion, or simply wish to donate,
you are welcome to send me an email.

account.tAccount: Use the same settings for all characters.
